description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 5, 6} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,1,-1).
formula: a(n+1)=Sum_k>=0 {A030308(n,k)*b(k)} with b(0)=1, b(1)=5 and b(k)=2^(k+1) for k>1. - From _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Oct 19 2011.G.f. x^2*(1+4*x+x^2+2*x^3) / ( (1+x)*(x^2+1)*(x-1)^2 ). - R. J. Mathar, Dec 07 2011a(n) = sum_{i=1..n} GCD(i+2, i-2). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 23 2014
mathematica: Table[Sum[GCD[i + 2, i - 2], {i, n}], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jan 23 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
